EmailTemplate.subject: Work Opportunities
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
WORK OPPORTUNITIES
Thank you for your interest in working for NCS powered by The Challenge.
We are aware that to date you have not received a role with us this summer and wanted to give you the opportunity of working with us on our Autumn programme and applying for core roles. Please see opportunities below.
AUTUMN PROGRAMMES
The Autumn programme is a compacted version of the Summer programme. Please follow the link at the bottom of this email to our web site for details on dates and roles.
To be considered to work on the Autumn programme in the role you were assessed for, please click on the New Availability link to confirm your availability.
NB You will not be required to attend training
New Availability form: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=1b49htgah35ov&q1={!Job_Application__c.Id}
CORE ROLES/YEAR ROUND ROLES
We are currently looking for candidates for a range of roles within the Challenge. Please follow the link to the web site and look under 'Year round roles' for job description and application process.
Details of all the roles and dates can be found on our web site below.
http://www.the-challenge.org/index.php/support-us/work-for-us
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} 5.1.2 Autumn
